titleStmt.title: Ragged, and torne, and true. Or, The poore mans resoltion [sic], to the tune of Old Simon the King.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assignes of Thomas Symcocke,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "I am a poore man, God knowes ..."
Place and date of publication suggested by STC.
In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
